organic_results.title: Some points on choice in education
organic_results.snippet: The movement toward choice is the first step in a movement toward getting the incentives right in educationincentives for both the suppliers of educational services, that is, schools and their teachers, and for the consumers of education, that is, parents and children. The incentives for schools that a voucher system would introduce would include an interest in attracting and keeping the best students they could. The incentives for parents and students would include the ability to get into schools they find attractive and to remain in those …
